mapper.select: SELECT mrd.*, mb.specifications FROM material_requisition mr LEFT JOIN material_requisition_detail mrd ON mrd.material_requisition_id = mr.id LEFT JOIN material_base mb ON mb.`code` = mrd.materials_code WHERE mr.del_flag = 0 AND mrd.del_flag = 0 AND mr.code = #{code} AND mr.material_requisition_type = #{requisitionType}
